languages.text: "Законодержец был верен своему писанию, за него сражался и умер. Непоколебим оставался до конца — достойная погибель для обычного смертного".

traits.locale_text: "Законотворец был верен своему писанию, за него сражался и умер. Непоколебим оставался до конца — достойная погибель для обычного смертного".

languages.text: "The lawkeeper was loyal to his scripture — he fought and died for it. Unshaken till the end — a worthy death for a mere mortal."
languages.original_text: "Законодержец был верен своему писанию, за него сражался и умер. Непоколебим оставался до конца — достойная погибель для обычного смертного".

traits.locale_text: "The lawkeeper was loyal to his scripture — he fought and died for it. Unshaken till the end — a worthy death for a mere mortal."
"The lawkeeper was loyal to his scripture — he fought and died for it. Unshaken till the end — a worthy death for a mere mortal."

"The lawkeeper was loyal to his scripture — he fought and died for it. Unshaken till the end — a worthy death for a mere mortal."

languages.text: 「あの法の番人は、自らの経典に忠実だった。そのために戦い、命を落とした。最後まで揺るがなかった。ただの人間にしては、実に立派な死だった」
languages.original_text: "The lawkeeper was loyal to his scripture — he fought and died for it. Unshaken till the end — a worthy death for a mere mortal."

traits.locale_text: 「あの法の番人は、自らの経典に忠実だった。そのために戦い、命を落とした。最後まで揺るがなかった。ただの人間にしては、実に立派な死だった」

languages.text: "Der Gesetzeshüter ist seinen Schriften treu geblieben. Er hat für sie gekämpft und ist für sie gestorben. Unerschütterlich bis zum Ende. Ein würdiger Tod für einen bloßen Sterblichen."
languages.original_text: "The lawkeeper was loyal to his scripture — he fought and died for it. Unshaken till the end — a worthy death for a mere mortal."

traits.locale_text: "Der Gesetzeshüter ist seinen Schriften treu geblieben. Er hat für sie gekämpft und ist für sie gestorben. Unerschütterlich bis zum Ende. Ein würdiger Tod für einen bloßen Sterblichen."

languages.text: « Le gardien de la loi est resté fidèle à ses textes, en se battant pour eux jusqu'à son dernier souffle. Une mort honorable pour ce mortel que rien n'a su ébranler. »
languages.original_text: "The lawkeeper was loyal to his scripture — he fought and died for it. Unshaken till the end — a worthy death for a mere mortal."

traits.locale_text: « Le gardien de la loi est resté fidèle à ses textes, en se battant pour eux jusqu'à son dernier souffle. Une mort honorable pour ce mortel que rien n'a su ébranler. »

languages.text: «El legislador era fiel a sus escrituras; luchó por ellas, y por ellas murió. Se mantuvo firme hasta el final. Una muerte digna para un simple mortal».
languages.original_text: "The lawkeeper was loyal to his scripture — he fought and died for it. Unshaken till the end — a worthy death for a mere mortal."

traits.locale_text: «El legislador era fiel a sus escrituras; luchó por ellas, y por ellas murió. Se mantuvo firme hasta el final. Una muerte digna para un simple mortal».

languages.text: “那位执法者忠于他的圣典。他为之战斗，为之牺牲，坚守到了最后一刻。对一介凡人而言，这算得上死得其所。”
languages.original_text: "The lawkeeper was loyal to his scripture — he fought and died for it. Unshaken till the end — a worthy death for a mere mortal."

traits.locale_text: “那位执法者忠于他的圣典。他为之战斗，为之牺牲，坚守到了最后一刻。对一介凡人而言，这算得上死得其所。”

languages.text: "Kanun koruyucu, yazıtına sadıktı; onun uğrunda savaşıp can verdi. Sonuna kadar da direndi. Sıradan bir ölümlü için şanlı bir ölüm tattı."
languages.original_text: "The lawkeeper was loyal to his scripture — he fought and died for it. Unshaken till the end — a worthy death for a mere mortal."

traits.locale_text: "Kanuncu, yazıtına sadıktı; onun uğrunda savaşıp can verdi. Sonuna kadar da direndi. Sıradan bir ölümlü için şanlı bir ölüm tattı."

languages.original_text: "The lawkeeper was loyal to his scripture — he fought and died for it. Unshaken till the end — a worthy death for a mere mortal."
